Class MusicSpeechDataset

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.openimaj.data.dataset.MapBackedDataset<String,Dataset<File>,File>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<File>, Map<String,Dataset<File>>, Dataset<File>, GroupedDataset<String,Dataset<File>,File>

    @DatasetDescription(name="Music-Speech Dataset",
                    description="The \'music-speech\' corpus is a small collection of some 240 15-second extracts collected \'at random\' from the radio by Eric Scheirer during his internship at Interval Research Corporation in the summer of 1996 under the supervision of Malcolm Slaney",
                    url="http://labrosa.ee.columbia.edu/sounds/musp/scheislan.html")
 @Reference(type=Inproceedings,
           author={"Scheirer E.","Slaney, M."},
           title="Construction And Evaluation Of A Robust Multifeature Speech/music Discriminator",
           year="1997",
           booktitle="Proc. ICASSP-97, Munich.")
public class MusicSpeechDataset
extends MapBackedDataset<String,Dataset<File>,File>
    OpenIMAJ Dataset for the MusicSpeech Database
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
